Posts.Content: alpacalove wrote: She thought was a virus until she had so much pain in her back one day she couldn't get out of bed, and now she has to sleep in a special chair so not painful :( And being her oldest daughter not really sure who else to talk to as sister doesn't totally understand as younger and dad in medical field so mostly knows but doesn't want to talk about it and my friends well they're there but won't understand at all. Please help me help my Mum! Just found out she gone back into hosp, she was dx with lobar carcinoma and taking arimidex pretty sure and except for bones are weak, it began in her lymph and bones tumours down spine and in pubic bone but not her organs. Family so shocked because boobs so small and doc could not even feel tumour!!!! Blood test show nothing they did biopsy and some scan to see it. She wasn't allowed to start treatment til she had rods put in her neck because cervical bones were too weak allow treatment to work but now she's had several session of radiotherapy starting on her neck as worst tumour there and working down ones on spine, but she in hosp now as due to dry mouth from neck radiation which got infected and then they found her t1 vertebrate has massively deteriorated :(.She's only 59 and still needs to do alot of things in her life!! Dad being medical headed always scared for how long she had left and I've read some stories on here and you all sound have done amazingly well!! Please pray the same for my Mum!! :):') Has anyone had dry mouth and what did you eat!??! or have anyone been through similar?!? please gve me some advice i can share with my fam! xo  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mum dx month and half ago alpacalove alpacalove

Posts.Content: Dec 6, 2011 03:16PM alpacalove wrote: Ah sorry probabably didnt give enough info, We live in the country near melbourne-aus except I'm away for work at the moment and my sister is away for sport atm as well. But we'll be home by end of week. And it'll be sad seeing my mum like that when I get back. I don't think so atm, they just seeing how goes I guess, I really dont understand how they didnt pick up on her t1 until she went to hosp for infection :| :(.
